targets.query: SELECT non_negative_difference(mean("cpu.stat.usage_usec"))  / ($__interval_ms * 1000) FROM "cgroup" WHERE ("path"::tag =~ /user-1000\.slice/ AND "path"::tag =~ /app\.slice\/app-[^\/]+\.(slice|scope)$/ AND "host"::tag =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host"::tag, "path"::tag fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_difference(last("bytes_recv")) / $__interval_ms * 1000 FROM "net" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host"::tag, "interface"::tag fill(null)
SELECT 100 - mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$host$/) AND ("cpu"::tag = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host"::tag fill(null)
SELECT mean("utilization_gpu") FROM "nvidia_smi" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host"::tag fill(null)
SELECT (mean("memory_used") / mean("memory_total")) * 100 FROM "nvidia_smi" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host"::tag fill(null)

SELECT ((mean("fan_input") - mean("fan_min")) / (mean("fan_max") - mean("fan_min"))) * 100 FROM "sensors" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host"::tag, "chip"::tag fill(null)
